ing: 1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast, cubed
1 (10.75 ounce) can Campbell'sÂ® Condensed Cream of Chicken Soup (Regular or 98% Fat Free)
n: Creamy Pesto Chicken and Bow Ties
des: "Use Campbell'sÂ® Condensed Cream of Chicken Soup, chicken breast, and bow tie pasta to make an easy one-dish meal with a creamy pesto sauce."
ins:
Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain.
Meanwhile, heat butter in skillet. Add chicken and cook until browned, stirring often.
Add soup, pesto sauce and milk. Bring to a boil. Cook over low heat 5 minutes or until done. Stir in drained pasta and heat through.
